@kentcdodds @brunowinck @jlengstorf @Netlify @gatsbyjs Related and maybe of interest: If your build is hefty due to doing lots of image transformations, having Netlify transform and cache these on-the-fly should really speed up your build times. Good for responsive images: https://t.co/LqFzgOfs8G https://t.co/3FFq3hq7Va
